meanings.definition: More impressive or imposing in size or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The grander castle stood tall on the hill.
meanings.sent2: The grander mountain peak was covered in snow.
meanings.sent3: The grander cake towered over the other desserts.
meanings.sent4: Her grander dreams reached for the stars.
meanings.sent5: The grander fireworks display lit up the night sky.

meanings.definition: More important or significant in scope or scale.
meanings.sent1: The grander decision would shape their future.
meanings.sent2: The grander event drew a large crowd.
meanings.sent3: The grander idea sparked a lively debate.
meanings.sent4: His grander vision inspired others to join him.
meanings.sent5: The grander purpose behind the project became clear.
